title: Atlantean Nami skin idea splash art

embed.description: Here it is! my Atlantean Nami splash art! redrawn from my original artwork of it which you can find through this link!...

body:
Hey guys, as it says in the title i drew my skin idea 'Atlantean Nami' as a splashart! Wondering if i should also draw what the abilities and stuff would look like too.. but yeah! feel free to give me some feed back :) Theres also a link to my FB page for more!

EDIT: Soo i made a concept for her abilities and stuff! i still need to work on it though but here it is so far 
https://www.facebook.com/542006589222736/photos/a.542013755888686.1073741828.542006589222736/793754134047979/?type=1&theater

replies.body: Hey, maybe you could help me with my champion and skin designs? Could u be my artist for champ and skin designs? TechnoFlame is my smurf
hey uh it depends, cuz i usually charge people if im going to draw for them
Plss can it be without charge? I don't have a job yet
Please don't take artists for granted. If someone offers to draw you a freebie, that's great, but Hamzilla needs money to buy food just as much as anyone else.
How can I get someone to draw for me when I'm 13 *_*  and have no money so im asking nicely if he could
I'll think about it..im just busy with other drawings too, ill grt around to it when im free?

I like it but as a skin it doesn't have any unique differences. looks more like a visual update you know? you could make a spectral skin maybe and have it so her bottom half is a mist and she is a ghost or something but this doesn't offer much more than a fashion change.

quality; 10/10
originality; 8/10
unique-ness or whatever word you would use; 5/10, maybe up to 7/10 

over all; pretty good, just add in something which makes it its own thing. maybe her ult could be a wave of crabs or something? idk
Thanks for the feedback! i was thinking of like drawing what the abilities would look like etc and try to make it seem unique, but thank you i really appreciate it!

hmmm i cant promise anything but i would like to try :) ill do it bit by bit, if you want to contact me about it feel free to like my page on fb and message me and i can send it to you when its done :) its Hamzilla15

It's a good picture, but like Charlie I think the skin could be better.

If it was me, I'd make it a legendary skin. Give her legs and a flowing dress, and have her kick her legs as she swims through the air.

If that particle effect could be pulled off it would be so cool!
